@PremiumTimesng The interest rate of NIRSAL micro-finance bank TCF for  COVID-19 sponsored by #CentralbankofNigeria is put at 5% deducted on reducing balance. 

That means if you apply for a house hold loan of N500,000 then you end up paying a compounded interest of N397,928 which is almost 80%
